short_intro: Brainware Medha Britti is a merit-based scholarship designed to financially support academically consistent students pursuing undergraduate programs at Brainware University. The scholarship amount is awarded based on 10+2 academic performance and is deducted from the final semester tuition fees.
objective: Encourage academic consistency throughout a student's career
Reward meritorious students with financial assistance
Reduce the financial burden of higher education
Promote excellence in technical and professional education

minimum_academic_requirement.overall: Candidate must have secured minimum 60% marks throughout the entire academic career (Class 10 onwards).
minimum_academic_requirement.note: Failure to maintain 60% at any stage makes the candidate ineligible.

scholarship_amount_structure.description: Scholarship amount varies based on 10+2 percentage range. Higher performance attracts higher benefits.
scholarship_amount_structure.deduction_policy: All scholarship amounts are deducted from the last semester tuition fees.

important_conditions: Not applicable if Brainware Vidyalankar Scholarship is availed
Only one Brainware University scholarship can be opted at a time
not_applicable_for: International students (implicit as institutional merit rule)
Candidates not meeting 60% academic consistency rule

renewal_policy.reason: Scholarship amount is awarded once and adjusted in the final semester fees.

faqs.question: When is the scholarship amount adjusted?
faqs.answer: The scholarship amount is deducted from the last semester tuition fees.

faqs.question: Can I apply if I scored below 65% in 10+2?
faqs.answer: No. Minimum eligibility starts from 65% in 10+2.

faqs.question: Can this scholarship be combined with other Brainware scholarships?
faqs.answer: No. Only one Brainware University scholarship scheme can be availed.

last_updated: As per official Brainware University Scholarship Document
